short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zoomify: Discover essential information from text and images with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zoomify is a browser extension that allows you to zoom in on image details, display information such as the image's URL and size, while also enabling you to explore text characteristics, including font, size, line spacing, color, and much more.
